meanings.sent1: The two flowers were unalike in color.
meanings.sent2: The twins looked unalike despite being siblings.
meanings.sent3: The unalike socks made him look mismatched.
meanings.sent5: The unalike shapes of the clouds painted a unique sky.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is not alike.
meanings.sent1: She danced unalike to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent2: The two cars moved unalike on the road.
meanings.sent3: He sang unalike, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: The leaves fell unalike, swirling in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The students worked unalike, each with their own style.
